briefdescription.para: The provided address is valid but does not refer to a public key.
The provided signature couldn't be parsed (maybe invalid base64).
A public key could not be recovered from the provided signature and message.
The message was not signed with the private key of the provided address.

detaileddescription.para:
The result of a signed message verification. Message verification takes as an input:
address (with whose private key the message is supposed to have been signed)
signature
message
Text used to signify that a signed message follows and to prevent inadvertently signing a transaction.

Verify a signed message.
address
Signer's bitcoin address, it must refer to a public key.
signature
The signature in base64 format.
message
The message that was signed.
result code

Sign a message.
privkey
Private key to sign with.
message
The message to sign.
signature
Signature, base64 encoded, only set if true is returned.
true if signing was successful.
Hashes a message for signing and verification in a manner that prevents inadvertently signing a transaction.
